ai:cl.c: Threads are created and managed by the Thread class.

ai:a.c: Spawn a new thread that calls the function referenced in the Routine field.
Remove the object and its resources.

ai:m.p: ERR th::SetData(OBJECTPTR Object, APTR Data, INT Size)

ai:i.c: Size of the data buffer. If zero, the pointer is stored directly, with no copy operation taking place.

ai:f.c: A function reference that will be called when the thread is started.
Pointer to initialisation data for the thread.
The size of the buffer referenced in the Data field.
Reflects the error code returned by the thread routine.
Optional flags can be defined here.
A function reference that will be called when the thread is started.
